price: 97 Et dis : « J’implore, Seigneur, Ta protection contre les tentations des démons,
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
